name: Awake
description: After a devastating global event wiped out all electronics and eliminated people's ability to sleep, a former soldier may have found a solution with her daughter.
keywords: soldier, electronics, solution, insomnia, t bone car crash

review.author: hcb-80
review.heading: Wasted opportunity
review.reviewBody:
My guess is the pitch that made Netflix give the greenlight was convincing. But...

Likeability of protagonists: close to zero.

Pacing of story: not working

Gory scenes: I feel nothing.

I could go on, but let's just say it doesn't work.

To the filmmakers: if you get the greenlight, don't screw it up like this.
